credit_line: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
title: Design for a Base
medium: Pen and yllow ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
description: Rectangular base tapering toward bottom with rounded upper corners drawn in elevation.  To be executed in white marble with a central applied vermeil band indicated in pen and yellow ink.  Lines drawn to indicate object sitting in well.  Underdrawing in graphite of based in golden section.
name: Drawing
